physical_appearance: The image shows a colour photograph. It depicts a group of people. They are sitting around a dining table. The table is covered with a checkered tablecloth. There are beverages on the table. The men are dressed in suits and ties while the women are wearing sleeveless dresses. They are looking and speaking to one another. Other groups of people can be discerned in the background.
sgcool_label_text: This Polacolor photograph shows a group seated at a dining table.
title_text: Photograph of a group at a dining table
subject_terms_2: Colour photography Dinners and dining Beverages
